code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[name,setName]=useState("");const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const fetchUsers=async()=>{const res=await axios.get("/api/users");setUsers(res.data);};const addUser=async()=>{await axios.post("/api/users",{name});setName("");fetchUsers();};useEffect(()=>{fetchUsers();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Add User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addUser,children:"Add"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:users.map(u=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:u.name},u.id))})]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83D\uDE80 Deployed via GitHub Actions to AWS EKS!"})});}export default App;
